/* portal-widget.findListMyTodo : 할일 항목 조회 */ SELECT GP.TODO_GRP_CD , GP.TODO_GRP_NM , GP.COMM_MENU_YN , CASE WHEN #{g.locale} = 'ko_KR' THEN TI.TODOITEM_NM ELSE CASE WHEN TI.TODOITEM_NM_EN IS NULL THEN TI.TODOITEM_NM ELSE TI.TODOITEM_NM_EN END END AS TODOITEM_NM , TI.MENU_CD , TI.MENU_URL_PARM , TI.SQL_ID FROM TODO_TASK_TYP GP INNER JOIN TODOITEM TI ON TI.TEN_ID = GP.TEN_ID AND TI.USR_TYP_CCD = GP.USR_TYP_CCD AND TI.TODO_GRP_CD = GP.TODO_GRP_CD WHERE GP.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND GP.USR_TYP_CCD = #{g.usr_typ_ccd}
AND GP.TODO_GRP_CD = #{todoGrpCd} AND TI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ( GP.COMM_MENU_YN = 'Y' /* 공통인 경우 */ OR ( GP.COMM_MENU_YN = 'N' /* 공통이 아닌경우 해당 사용자 */ AND EXISTS ( SELECT US.USR_ID FROM TODOITEM_USR US WHERE US.TEN_ID = TI.TEN_ID AND US.TODOITEM_UUID = TI.TODOITEM_UUID AND US.USR_ID = #{g.username} ) ) ) ORDER BY TI.TODOITEM_SORT

/* portal-widget.countApproval */ SELECT COUNT(APRV.APVL_UUID) FROM APVL APRV INNER JOIN APVLLN_APVR_PRGS_STS APLNAPS ON APLNAPS.TEN_ID = APRV.TEN_ID AND APLNAPS.APVL_UUID = APRV.APVL_UUID AND APLNAPS.USR_ID = #{g.username} AND ( APLNAPS.LAST_APVR_YN = 'Y' /* 전결이거나 */ OR APLNAPS.CURR_APVR_YN = 'Y' /* 현재 결재순서의 결재자 */ ) AND APLNAPS.STS != 'D' WHERE APRV.TEN_ID = #{g.tenant} AND APRV.APVL_TYP_CCD = #{p.apvl_typ_ccd} /* 결재유형 */ AND APRV.APVL_STS_CCD = 'PRGSG' /* 진행중 */ AND APRV.STS != 'D'
